Competency Question/Natural Language Sen: YANG data source is available in a URL and port
YANG data source is configured with username and password credentials
Data of a YANG data source can be filtered using XPath
NETCONF is a type of YANG data source
Data of a NETCONF data source can be filtered using an XML subtree
NETCONF data source may use a device profile defined by a network vendor
gNMI, NETCONF, and RESTCONF are types of YANG data sources
